title: Okinawa Beachfront Retreat with Club Lounge Access, Daily Breakfast & Guaranteed Ocean Views
description:
On Japan’s southern island of Okinawa, just a three-hour direct flight from Tokyo, immerse yourself in a modern escape within one of Japan's most pristine national parks. Enjoy sweeping waterfront views and dive into the shimmering East China Sea from the hotel’s private beach, where vibrant coral reefs await.

Set sail on a catamaran cruise to explore Cape Manza or relax in your serene room, which includes access to the newly renovated Club InterContinental Lounge, featuring stunning 270-degree ocean and sunset views. With exceptional dining options, a luxurious wellness centre complete with a traditional onsen and a wide variety of resort activities, endless entertainment awaits.
offer_address: 2260 Serakaki, Onna-son, Kunigami-gun District, Okinawa 904-0493, Japan

title: Sophisticated Okinawa Beachfront Retreat with Private Beach near Onna Village
description: InterContinental Ana Manza Beach Resort combines five-star luxury with the best of tradition, in Japan's southern isle of Okinawa. Take in the panoramic waterfront views, dive into the glittering East China Sea at the hotel’s private beach where kaleidoscopic coral reefs await or explore Cape Manza on a catamaran cruise. With world-class dining options within the resort, a luxurious wellness centre and an abundance of resort activities, there’s an endless supply of entertainment at your fingertips.
location_description: InterContinental ANA Manza Beach Resort, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 2260 Serakaki, Onna, Kunigami District, Okinawa 904-0493, Japan

title: Okinawa Seaside Serenity with Three Pools, Water Slides & Open-Air Onsen Experience
description:
Combining Japanese tradition with a touch of modern luxury, this seaside sanctuary is your ideal Okinawa retreat. Greeted by views of the East China Sea and nestled amid lush landscapes, spend your days by one of Okinawa's largest pools, float along the lazy river or relax in the adults-only pool while the kids discover the thrilling water slides.

Immerse yourself in Okinawan 'chimugukuru' hospitality and savour dynamic local and international cuisine at Le Sensoriel, including regional favourites prepared with a twist. For something a little different, make the most of the unique onsen and open-air public bath experiences onsite.
location_description: Grand Mercure Okinawa Cape Zanpa Resort
